publications.title: A Low-Cost Internet of things cloud based solution for the intelligent rearing of the black soldier fly
publications.description: Research paper accepted to IEEE AFRICON 2023, presented in October 2023. Developed a low-cost cloud-based solution for black soldier fly rearing with potential applications in sustainable agriculture and animal feed production.

presentations.title: A Low-Cost Internet of things cloud based solution for the intelligent rearing of the black soldier fly
presentations.description: Presented research on IoT sensors for detecting humidity, temperature and light values for black soldier fly rearing, with remote monitoring capabilities for studying their effect on BSF growth.

presentations.title: Drivers, Future and Opportunities of Power and Energy in Uganda
presentations.description: Organized and participated in panel session as IEEE PES Day Ambassador, promoting awareness about sustainable energy and power engineering opportunities in Uganda.

presentations.title: Natural Voice Language Model Training on Runyankore Dataset
presentations.description: Worked on training natural voice language model on Runyankore dataset for 3 months as undergraduate researcher.
